glycation.text: The Glycation sections provides a list of list of sites with non-enzymatic, covalently linked glycans specified in the publication.
glycation.title: Glycation

general.text: The General section contains citation information and abstract of the publication.
general.title: General

referenced_proteins.text: The Referenced Proteins sections provides a list of proteins specified in the publication.
referenced_proteins.title: Referenced Proteins

biomarkers.text: The Biomarkers section contains biomarkers referenced in the publication.
biomarkers.title: Biomarkers

expression.text: The Expression section contains information on the expression of glycans within tissues and cell lines.
expression.title: Expression

organism.text: The Organism section contains the list of organism(s) discussed in the publication.
organism.title: Organism

glycosylation.text: The Glycosylation section provides a detailed list of protein glycosylation sites, reported glycans attached to the protein(s), predicted glycosylation sites and glycosylation sites text mined from publications.
glycosylation.title: Glycosylation

snv.text: The Single Nucleotide Variation (SNV) sections provides a list of mutation sites specified in the publication.
snv.title: Single Nucleotide Variation

phosphorylation.text: The Phosphorylation sections provides a list of phosphorylation sites specified in the publication.
phosphorylation.title: Phosphorylation

mutagenesis.text: The Mutagenesis section describes the experimental change(s) in amino acid and position specified in the publication.
mutagenesis.title: Mutagenesis

referenced_glycans.text: The Referenced Glycans sections provides a list of glycans specified in the publication.
referenced_glycans.title: Referenced Glycans
